title: Nehemiah Sent to Rebuild
summary: Nehemiah requests and receives permission from King Artaxerxes to rebuild Jerusalem. Upon arrival, he inspects the city’s damage and secretly plans the restoration. Despite opposition, he rallies the people to begin the work.

faq.question: How did King Artaxerxes respond to Nehemiah’s request?
faq.answer: He granted permission and provided letters for safe passage and supplies.

faq.question: What did Nehemiah do upon arriving in Jerusalem?
faq.answer: He inspected the walls at night and motivated the people to rebuild.
